summary: The diff implements a comprehensive UI redesign from a teal/cyan/blue theme to an orange/red theme. Color variables, glassmorphism effects, and icon components have been updated throughout the application. However, the requirement to replace Font Awesome icons with 'new icons that match the design style of the reference site' was not fulfilled—the implementation continues using Font Awesome (react-icons) instead of replacing them with different icon assets or a new icon library.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace all Font Awesome icons throughout the application with new icons that match the design style of the reference site
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows Font Awesome icons (FaTint, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaWind, etc.) are still used throughout all components. Icons were not replaced with new icon assets or a different icon library—only their colors were changed to orange. The AC states 'IconBadge component uses new icon assets or icon library,' but IconBadge.tsx still uses react-icons IconType.
